definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_isinwater"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.bubble_column.whirlpool_inside</field><field name="soundcategory">neutral</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion" inline="false"><field name="potion">HASTE</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_add_potion" inline="false"><field name="potion">WATER_BREATHING</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1200</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="item_cooldown_for"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"></block></value><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2400</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
